mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eleme_refund_order_message(eleme_order_id, order_id, refund_status, reason, shop_id, refund_type, total_price, update_time, tenant_id, branch_id, create_user_id, last_update_user_id, last_update_remark) VALUES(#{elemeOrderId}, #{orderId}, #{refundStatus}, #{reason}, #{shopId}, #{refundType}, #{totalPrice}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{branchId}, #{createUserId}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{lastUpdateRemark})
